mapper.select: SELECT queidx,id,subject,reg_date,ansstatus FROM question ORDER BY reg_date DESC

select.if: SELECT q.queidx,q.id,q.subject,q.content,q.reg_date,q.ansstatus,q.type,a.content AS answer,a.reg_date FROM question q INNER JOIN answer a ON q.queidx=a.queidx AND q.queidx=#{idx}

mapper.update: UPDATE question SET subject=#{subject}, type=#{type}, content=#{content} WHERE queIdx=6
